core_metadata.title: string - title of the screenplay or project
core_metadata.genre: string - main genre (e.g., thriller, drama, sci-fi)
core_metadata.duration_minutes: number - target runtime or length in minutes
core_metadata.synopsis: string - one to two sentence summary or logline

narrative_context.setting: string - description of time and place (e.g., near-future Seoul, 2040)
narrative_context.tone: string - emotional or stylistic tone (e.g., dark, hopeful, surreal)
narrative_context.theme: string - underlying moral, idea, or philosophical concept

acts.title: string - title or description (e.g., Act I – The Setup)
beats: string - list of narrative beats or major turning points

scene_list.title: string - scene title
scene_list.summary: string - one-line scene purpose or description

visual_storytelling.style: string - general cinematic style (e.g., noir, documentary, stylized)
visual_storytelling.camera_approach: string - overall camera language (static, handheld, cinematic)

generation_parameters.draft_scope: string - what to generate (outline, first act, full draft)
generation_parameters.format: string - desired output format (e.g., Fountain, screenplay JSON)
generation_parameters.model_role: string - instruction for the LLM (e.g., 'Act as a professional screenwriter')
generation_parameters.continuation_policy: string - whether to generate all scenes or step-by-step

visual_references: string - reference films, shows, or styles
optional_additions.production_notes: string - director or producer’s specific goals
